summary: The infamous story of Charles Whitman, "America's favourite sniper" (in Stephen King's words), is told here once again.
cast: Kurt Russell|Richard Yniguez|Ned Beatty|Pernell Roberts|Clifton James|John Forsythe|Gilbert Roland|Paul Carr|Alan Vint|Maria Elena Cordero|Pepe Serna|Don Hood|Jerry Leggio|Roger Manning
title: The Deadly Tower
